inn1.comm: Rasel starts off with a ball angling across the batsman, pitching just outside off, batsman looks to drive but misses
that cut back in sharply, after pitching on off, the batsman was surprised by the movement and just about manages to get bat on it
again the ball angles across the batsman, good length delviery, Masakadza looks to defend but is beaten
slightly overpitched on the pads this time, pushed towards mid-on
this has been a solid over from Rasel so far, pitching it on a length and getting it to move into the batsman, who defends back towards the bowler

Rasel rounds off a superb over with a wicket, pretty wide outside off, Masakadza swings at it, should have left it alone, gets a thin outside edge to the keeper, a loose shot, and that's a terrible start for Zimababwe
Hossain also starts well, straightaway hitting a length outside off, batsman wanted to defend but is beaten
slightly wider outside off, left alone by the batsman
this time it is on off stump, Vermeulen gets on the front foot and blocks it back towards the bowler
first runs for Zimbabwe, Hossain overpitches it on middle and leg, flicked away in front of square leg
Hossain sticks to a good line and length, gets an inside-edge towards fine leg
a touch fuller from Hossain, a good-looking extra-cover drive from Vermeulen, but doesn't beat the fielder
short of a length from Rasel, the batsman gets on the back foot and chops it towards third man
length ball just outside off, driven firmly off the front foot towards the covers
fullish on middle and leg, blocked back down the pitch
back of a length, and again the ball is pushed back towards the bowler
short of a length, just outside off, Vermuelen gets on the front foot and powers it past extra cover for a boundary
big appeal for lbw, going on with angle after pitching on a back of a length, on middle, looked to be missing off stump
similar length, well outside off, Chibhabha looks to cut off the back foot but misses
this time he connects, he was attempting the same stroke as on the previous delivery, he moved across towards the line of the ball and gets bat on ball, which races away fine of third man
length ball on the pads, glanced down to fine leg for a single
length ball on middle and off, Vermuelen stays on the back foot and turns it towards square leg
back of a length ball just outside off, Vermuelen stands tall and forces it wristily towards midwicket
punched towards extra cover off the back foot by Vermuelen
shot, full ball on the pads, it was a slower ball from Hossain, Vermuelen flicks it to the right of a diving mid-on fielder
Vermuelen growing in confidence here, he stands tall and muscles it towards cover this time, the fielder had to sprint across to his right to cut it off
strays on to the pads this time, easy pickings for Vermuelen, nudges it towards square leg
much better line from Hossain, heading for off stump, Vermuelen punches it toward mid-off, too firmly to have time to take a single
similar ball from Hossain to end the over, similar response from Vermuelen, mid-off has more fielding to do
shortish and wide outside off stump, left alone by the batsman, keeper standing up, collects it well
just outside off stump, defended off the back foot
massive appeal for lbw, Rasel was convinced that was out, pitching on a length on middle, going on with the angle, strikes the batsman's pads but would have missed off
on the pads this time, Vermuelen stabs it wide of mid-on
'Beautiful Rassie', shouts Mushfiqur as Rasel sends down a length ball pitching on off and giving back in, defended by the batsman
again Mushfiqur chirps encouragement, Vermuelen was a little uncomfortable defended that one, it was on a length on middle, Vermuelen chose to stay on the back foot and defends
Hossain strikes, that's the end of Chibhabha, not too great a delivery, back of a length just outside off, going straight on, Chibhabha gets a thin edge to the keeper
angling in towards middle, Taylor defends it solidly back down the pitch
length ball, jagging in towards of stump, Taylor blocks it back down the pitch
on middle and leg this time, punched to the right of the bowler, mid-on has to make ground to his left to cut it off
Hossain keeps it tight, length ball heading to offstump, Vermuelen defends
on the pads, Vermuelen works it away wide of mid-on for a single
shortish ball, played from just outside off, pushed towards mid-off
moves in a touch after pitching on off, Vermuelen looked to defend off the front foot, gets an inside edge which takes the ball towards square leg
easy runs for Zimbabwe, Rasel slides one down the leg side, an attempted slower ball, Taylor gets some bat on it and sends it scurrying past the keeper for a boundary
'Great areas Rassie' is the call this time from Mushfiqur, defended towards extra cover
short of length, angling across Taylor, who blocks it towards the off side
pitched up, just outside off, Taylor gets a big stride in as he defends solidly
on the pads, whipped away by Vermuelen, the fielder at midwicket dives to his left to cut it off
fullish, on middle and leg, driven firmly towards mid-on
back of a length, about a foot outside off, batsman opens the face and steers it towards point, 'No' he cries after thinking about a single
close to the off stump, Taylor gets in the backfoot and slashes it to point, straight towards the fielder
back of a length, well outside off, jabbed towards point
gets his line wrong this time, sliding the ball down leg, helped along towards fine leg, and that's the end of the first Powerplay
powerfully struck, but can't beat the point fielder, Vermeulen had a bit of width to work with, and he latched on to that one, needed better placement though
tight line just outside off, blocked back towards the bowler
length ball, pitching on off, Vermeulen strides forward and punches it towards extra cover
half-volley well outside off stump, Taylor drives that powerfully past extra cover, Ashrafull chases after it and stops it with his foot at the boundary
opens the face of the bat to guide the ball towards point
back of a length, keeps it tight, Taylor can only defend that one
short of length, on off, punched off the back foot towards mid-on
wonderful shot from Vermeulen, length ball on off, the batsman stands tall and powers the ball past extra cover, that was driven on the up
on the pads this time, pushed towards mid-on, straight towards the fielder
swings and misses outside off, no footwork at all from Vermeulen, it was a length delivery outside off
back of a length angling into the leg stump, clipped towards square leg
back of a length, heading for the leg stump, pushed off the back foot towards mid-on
nearly strikes first ball, tossed up, full toss which was almost played back to the bowler, lands just short
overpitched outside off, driven down to long-off for a single
that was plumb, but umpire Saheba turns it down, hitting low in front of offstump, would have hit off and middle
defended toward the off side by Vermuelen
on the pads, turned towards midwicket
appeal for lbw, but that pitched outside leg
length ball on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
Vermuelen stays on the back foot and turns a leg stump ball towards midwicket
a big stride forward as he defends it confidently off the front foot
Vermuelen is down the track as he tries to deal with a flatter delivery from Enamul, inside egde onto the pad
heading down the leg side, nudged behind square on the leg side
flighted delivery outside off, the batsman takes a couple of steps and punches it to long-off
clipped towards backward square leg for a single
Zimbabwe's 50 comes up as Vermuelen turns the ball towards square leg
punched towards long-off for a single
bowled from wide of the crease, angling towards middle, defended by Taylor
length ball on the pads, chipped over midwicket by the batsman, the ball doesn't quite go all the way to the boundary
gets forward and nudges it toward square leg
Vermuelen stands tall and powers it towards mid-on
length ball just outside off, Taylor drives it back to the bowler
keeps it on a length but strays on to the leg side, turned to square leg
on middle stump, Zimbabwe picking off the singles, this time to long-on
another huge appeal, the batsman is struck low on the pads in line with leg stump, but there was some doubt whether that would have gone on to hit leg stump
Nazmul drops it at deep midwicket, should have been taken that one, Vermuelen swing that high and there was plenty of time to get under it
gets forward and defends it to the off side
more front foot defence from Taylor
gets forward and defends it back down the pitch
pretty close to off stump, Vermuelen played it very late, steers it past backward point for a boundary
on the pads, Vermuelen is content to defend toward short leg
length ball on offstump, Taylor shows the full face of the bat as he punches it towards long-off
mows it over midwicket, it was a full ball outside off, that shot was pure power
stays one the back foot and pushes it to long-on
turned towards square leg
get forward and nudges it behind square leg this time to get a single
muscled off the back foot, but straight towards cover
flighted delivery outside off, glides it towards point
defended back towards the bowler
stays on the back foot and punches it towards extra cover
left lone outside the off stump by Taylor
more forward defence to end the over
defended towards midwicket
tries to chop it past backward point, but can't beat the fielder
keeps it tight around off, Vermuelen takes a couple of paces down the track but his punch doesn't go past the bowler
gets on the front foot and pushes it towards long-on
Taylor gets forwards and opens the face to get the ball towards point
hit high on the pads, the ball rolls towards backward point, the batsman scramble a leg bye
defended off the back foot towards point
turns the ball from off stump toward midwicket
almost an action replay of the previous ball
Taylor is gone lbw, he was pretty unlucky though, the ball looked to be heading for the stumps, but he got a thin inside edge as he defended, and he had got a massive stride in as well
End of another good over for Bangladesh, length ball on off, defended to the leg side
forced off the back foot towards midwicket, straight towards the fielder
back of a length on the off stump, punched towards long-on
pushed through quicker, Coventry gets behind the line and defends, 'One brings two boys', says Mushfiqur
Coventry gets off the mark by clobbering the ball over mid-on for a boundary
wide outside off, Coventry gets on the back foot and defends towards point
big appeal for lbw, but that was sliding down the leg side
length ball pitching on off, Vermeulen stays on the back foot and forces it to long-on
Coventry is square up by that one, luckily for him the outside edge rolls away harmlessly towards point
driven towards extra cover
another appeal for lbw, pitching outside off, and hitting the pad on off, batsman wasn't really playing a stroke, that was pretty close
ends the over by blocking the ball back to the bowler
pushed to long-on for a single
length ball pitching just outside off, pushed towards cover
'Catch' is the cry as Coventry swings a short ball towards midwicket, reaches the fielder on the bounce
defended towards square leg
superb half-century for Vermuelen, he gets the landmark by chopping a shortish ball towards sweeper cover
this time he shows the full face of the bat as he blocks it back down the pitch
flighted delivery, pitched up outside off, beaten as he looks to drive
tossed up delivery, punched back to the bowler
gets on the front foot and carves it over cover
low full toss on off stump, worked away to long-on
straying onto the pads, the batsman gets on the back foot and turns it towards square leg
overpitched, just outside off, driven firmly to long-off
on the pads, clipped to square leg for an easy single
first six of the day, lovely swing of the bat, doesn't bother much with the footwork, the full delivery is deposited over long-off
turned towards midwicket with soft hands
stands tall and pushes it back towards the bowler
keeps the bat and pad close together as he defends
takes a couple of steps down the track and muscles it towards long-off, all along the ground
overpitched just outside off, driven towards wide long-off
full ball on middle, swung away towards long-on
a bit of width outside off, played with soft hands towards point
length ball outside off, Coventry backs away to make room and drives it towards extra cover
powered towards wide long-off, Coventry races back for the second, good running that
length ball turning into the batsman, who stays in the back foot and works it behind square leg
full and on the pads, squeezed out towards midwicket
played towards midwicket for a single
wide outside off this time, steered towards point for yet another single
back of a length on off, wristily played to backward square leg
the fifth single of the over comes up with a drive to long-on
down the leg side, the batsman makes room and punches it to long-on to complete an over of singles

and he strikes first ball, Coventry's aggressive innings comes to an end, he was looking to clear the midwicket boundary, gets a bit of a top edge, and Mahmudullah takes a well-judged catch just within the rope
fullish on the pads, whipped towards long-on for a single
flighted, full outside off, pushed towards mid-off
defended towards point this time
flighted again, on middle and leg, pushed towards long-on
Vermuelen was early into his forward defensive, no worries for him though as the ball dribbles harmlessly towards the off side
short and wide, carved towards deep point for a single
length ball on off, Vermuelen gets forward and defends
similar delivery, turned towards midwicket this time
a bit outside off, Vermuelen gets forward and drops it towards cover
short ball on the leg side, Vermuelen swings his bat and gets the ball to backward square  leg
fullish and outside off, driven toward cover
short and on leg stump, hammered towards midwicket
length ball outside off, Williams stands tall and defends to the off side
more width this time for Williams, he chops it towards backward point
'Beauty, beauty' says Mushfiqur, as the batsman can only block the ball back towards the bowler
driven with more power this time, beats a diving Mahmudullah to get a single
on the pads this time, Vermeulen was early into his shot, lobs towards mid-on but wide of the fielder
length ball which is punched towards long-off for an easy single
another easy single, again driven to long-off
short of length, on middle and off, Vermuelen stays on the back foot and whips the ball towards long-on
angling into offstump, clips it towards midwicket
back of a length on off stump, punched towards wide mid-on
down the leg side, but not given a wide
driven down to long-on for a single
again punched to long-on

That's the end of Williams, he was plumb in front, missing the ball as he tries to play it to midwicket, that was a quicker delivery from Mahmudullah, pitching just outside off, struck on the back leg in front of off, no doubt about that
gets forward and pushes the ball back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, squeezed out towards mid-on
swept to short fine leg for a quick single
full on the pads, turned towards midwicket for a single
solidly defended off the front foot by Vermuelen
length ball on off, driven to the right of the bowler
gets forward to defend, a bit of an inside edge has the ball racing towards backward square leg
ovepitched on leg stump, blocked towards square leg
full and on the pads, turned toward midwicket, straight towards the fielder
stands tall and drives it back towards the bowler
quicker ball, on the pads, clipped towards midwicket
gets the single finally, Vermeulen turns it behind square leg
tossed up by the bowler, the batsman takes a couple of steps down the track and whips it towards long-on
overpitched on middle stump, Vermeulen plays it inside-out towards long-off for a single
pushes it off the back foot towards mid-on
gets forward and defends with soft hands
hit firmly this time, but straight at the fielder at extra cover
gets it wide of that fielder this time, and he finally gets a single, Zimbabwe need to up their scoring rate here
on the pads, nudged towards midwicket for a single
a one-handed sweep races to fine leg, a welcome boundary for Zimbabwe, and Vermuelen moves into the eighties
appeal for lbw, just pitching outside leg or he was a goner
Matsikenyeri is tired of blocking, he steps out and slogs the ball towards long-on, where Junaid misfields to give away a boundary
driven to long-off for a single this time
played back to the bowler off the front foot
long-off has more work to do, Vermeulen gets a single in that area
solid forward defensive to end the over
turned to square leg, straight towards the fielder
down the track, carves it inside out towards extra cover, where Mahmudullah dives to make a great stop
swept to deep backward square leg for a single
punched to mid-on, no run
hit firmly back to the bowler, another dot ball
and again the bowler collects the drive from the batsman
flighted delivery, pitching outside off, the batsman looked to smash it past point but misses
the pressure had been building up, and it shows, Matsikenyeri tries to loft the ball over long-on, doesn't get hold of it though, and Naeem Islam takes a simple catch at long-on
on the pads, turned to square leg
on leg stump this time, driven to mid-on
solid forward defensive to an offstump delivery
again looking to defend, gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
another one-handed sweep by Vermeulen, doesn't connect too well and the ball dribbles to backward square leg
full outside off, driven to extra cover
arm ball, slightly overpitched, Chigumbura mows it over midwicket for a boundary, Zimbabwe need more of those
Chigumbura gets another boundary, this was a poor ball, short and wide, Chigumbura crashes it in front of point for four
fired into middle and leg this time, blocked towards midwicket, the batsmen sprint a single
length ball, pitching outside off and turning away, Vermeulen flat bats it towards long-on for a single
full on leg stump, Chigumbura moves away from the stumps and punches it to long-on
played inside-out towards wide long-off, wide enough to get a couple of runs
short and on the pads, Chigumbura misses out, chops it onto his pads, and can only get a single towards square leg
No missing out this time, Chigumbura swings the bat cleanly to deposit a length ball on middle over long-on
squeezes out a full ball towards cover with soft hands
another one-handed sweep from Vermeulen, Ashraful had to race across and dive to his right, partly stops the ball, gets up and retrieves it, good work by him
length ball heading for middle, turned to square leg for a single
Chigumbura blocks this one back towards the bowler
an almighty heave from Chigumbura, he misses the ball, the ball misses leg stump, the keeper doesn't collect it either
well outside leg stump, Chigumbura swings it down to long leg
the batsman comes down the track, and pushes the ball to the right of the bowler
length ball outside off, driven firmly to long-off
overpitched on offstump, a good-looking drive but it doesn't beat the extra cover fielder

is he run out here? the ball was down the leg side, attempted slower delivery, turned towards square leg by Chigumbura, Vermeulen sprints back for the second but Raqibul is quickly onto the ball, he throws it to the bowler who breaks the stumps with Vermeulen short of his crease, Vermeulen had run the first one very slowly, he only stepped on the gas when he was called for the second
another slower ball, full on the pads, squeezed out to square leg
length ball on middle this time, Utseya blocks it back to the bowler
picked up from middle and swung to wide long-on
on the pads, worked towards square leg for a single
punched to long-on to give Chigumbura the strike
Chigumbura is gone, arm ball accounts for him, a wild heave from Chigumbura, and he misses the ball, and leg stump is lying on the ground
length ball on offstump, gets forward and defends
length ball just outside off, gets an inside edge towards backward square leg
length ball heading for off, punched down to long-off for a single
angling into leg stump, blocked back to the bowler
Rasel keeps to a leg-stump line, guided towards midwicket for a single
back of a length, heading for off stump, defended off the back foot towards mid-off
slower ball, full on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
low full toss on offstump, Price gets it away towards deep backward square leg
back of length ball on middle, Utseya pushes it towards midwicket, that's another dot ball
another slower ball, full and on the pads, nudged towards square leg
Utseya comes down the track, and drives it down to long-off
Price slams it for six, that was well outside off, Price swings it high over midwicket for six runs
driven off the back foot towards long-on for a single
pushed towards extra cover, dot ball
another dot ball, that was short and wide, Utseya cuts it hard but straight towards cover
length ball on the leg stump, makes room to punch it down to long-on
full on middle, played inside out towards long-off for a single
shortens his length, shifts the line to offstump, batsman looks to cut, gets a bottom edge onto the pads
overpitched on middle, punched back to the bowler
short of length, just outside off, Price looks to swing it over midwicket, misses and the ball just misses off stump
full on the pads, swung away towards deep midwicket
low full toss outside off, Price tries a cheeky paddle-sweep, hits the back of the bat, and the ball rolls towards point

high full toss outside off, Utseya swings at it and gets a top-edge, the ball swirls towards mid-on, who takes a comfortable catch, there is a lot of discussion between the umpires before it is decided that it was a no-ball due to the height
Price is cleaned up by the slower ball, a legcutter, Price was looking to swing it to midwicket, the ball slides lower than he expects and offstump is uprooted
bouncer well outside off, carved towards sweeper cover
another slower ball, Utseya clobbers it towards long-of, it land a few yards short of Ashraful, who misfields and has to scurry after the ball to keep it in
a yorker does the trick, Utseya misses and offstump is struck again, Zimbabwe are bowled out for 207

inn2.comm: low full toss from Chigumbura first up, blocked out towards mid-on
a bit of width, Tamim crashes it past point for a boundary, didn't bother to keep it on the ground either
short and angling into leg stump, defended towards square leg
another boundary, Bangladesh's batsman are making as good a start as their bowlers, this was overpitched just outside off, Tamim crunches it between the bowler and mid-off
full again, on middle and leg, Tamim gets behind the line and defends it
short ball, but very close to offstump, Tamim was looking to cut that, but there wasn't enough room to get power behind that shot, the ball dribbles towards cover
back of a length ball, punched off the back foot towards cover
on the pads this time, swung away to square leg, a good diving stop
a bit of width for Junaid, who chops it towards point
short and wide, Junaid isn't going to miss out on that, hammers it past point for a boundary
and yet another boundary, this was a better delivery, just back of a length and closer to offstump, Junaid steps forward and caresses it past extra cover

a hat-trick of boundaries, the bowler has been increasing the length and getting the ball closer and closer to the stumps, but Junaid again gets on the front foot and clobbers it between the bowler and mid-off
back of a length, just outside off, pushed towards extra cover
short of length ball, on middle and off, blocked back to the bowler
overpitched outside off stump, Tamim smashes it towards sweeper cover, Chigumbura has protection in the deep there
Junaid looks to turn it to square leg, gets an outside edge which balloons towards third man, lands wide of the fielder though
struck on the pads, but the ball was pitching outside leg stump
length ball on middle and leg, prodded towards mid-on
length ball angling across Junaid, who steps across and looks to slam it through covers, mistimed to the off side
Junaid gets it nicely off the middle of the bat, but his front-foot drive doesn't beat short cover
length ball on off stump, a lovely swing of Junaid's blade sends it scurrying to the long-on boundary, timing wasn't perfect but enough on it to go for four
Junaid dealing in boundaries here, a bit of width, not much footwork involved as he hammers it past extra cover has raced to 21
that's the end of Junaid's knock, looking for a repeat of the drives which have given Bangladesh a flying start, this time goes straight to Cremer at mid-off
angling into middle stump, pitching on a length, a bit of an inside edge takes the ball towards deep backward square leg
lovely shot from Tamim, length ball on offstump, nothing wrong with that, Tamim smashes it between the bowler and mid-off for four
on middle and off this time, Tamim gets behind the line and defends
back of a length on off stump, Tamim stands tall and punches it towards cover
well outside the off stump, Ashraful raises his bat above his head to let it through to the keeper
length ball on offstump, drives it inside-out towards mid-off
again it's wide of offstump, left alone by Ashraful
nicely flighted, but way down the leg side
full on middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
length ball outside off, Ashraful looks to carve it through the covers, gets a bottom edge and the ball rolls to the off side
on the pads, pushed towards mid-on this time
gets well forward as he blocks it towards the bowler
paddle-sweep a fullish delivery from middle stump, cheeky shot that, gets it fine enough to beat the fielder in the deep
Utseya fires it down the leg side, lucky for him that it wasn't called a wide
good delivery, on a length and moving in after pitching outside off, left alone
close to the offstump, but again Ashraful is happy to shoulder arms
short and very wide outside off, he'll have to re-bowl that one
length ball on off, pushed firmly back to the bowler
length ball in the corridor outside off, Ashraful leave it for the keeper
short and very wide, Ashraful chases it but doesn't make contact, that could have been called a wide
ends the over with a length ball, heading for offstump, Ashraful gets forward and defends solidly
tossed up by Utseya, very full, Tamim looks to paddle sweep, looked to have got a glove on it as it brushes his pad
on driven by Tamim towards mid-on to get a single
exaggeratedly cautious defence from Ashraful
no caution about that stroke which brings up towards Bangladesh's 50, a bit of width and Ashraful slashes that past point
slightly short from Utseya, and width for Ashraful, he's not going to miss those, flashes it past backward point to help himself to another boundary
length ball, just outside off, good-looking drive from Tamim, mid-off dives to his right to cut it off
on middle and leg this time, defended back towards the bowler
back of a length ball, on off, Tamim gets on the back foot and plays with soft hands towards extra cover, batsmen decide against taking what would have been a tight single
driven firmly but straight towards extra cover
a bit of width, Tamim pokes at it off the front foot, gets a thick outside edge which sends the ball towards third man
well outside off, left alone by Ashraful
back of a length, on off stump, slammed towards extra cover, doesn't beat the fielder
Tamim gets a boundary this time, a length ball on middle and leg, he gets forward and lofts it over mid-on, doesn't quite get hold of it but enough to clear the infield and roll for a boundary
slightly shorter this time, Tamim stands tall and punches to long-on, who was pushed back after the previous ball
shortish ball jags back a touch into Ashraful, who defends off the back foot
more watchful defence from Ashraful, this was a length delivery on off, Ashraful gets well forward as he taps it to the off side
an elegant cover drive from Ashraful, a misfield has the ball dribbling towards the boundary, a long chase for the fielder
fires it into leg stump, Ashraful pats it back towards mid-off
full on middle, Ashraful walks across and turns it towards square leg
short ball on leg stump, Ashraful doesn't give it the punishment it asked for, swinging it to deep midwicket
nicely tossed up, full and wide,Tamim mishits it along the ground to the keeper
on leg stump, played with soft hands towards midwicket, the batsmen zip through for a single
length ball on the pads, turned towards short fine leg

length ball on off stump, Tamim punches it to mid-off and sets off for a single, Ashraful hasn't even left his crease when Tamim is half-way across the pitch, he finally sets off, a direct hit at the keeper's end would have caught him short. The confusion started because Ashraful was watching the ball instead of looking at whether Tamim is going for a run
stands tall and chops a wide ball towards sweeper cover
fuller delivery outside off, Iqbal gets forward and pushes it to point
good length, driven off the front foot towards long-on
very close to off stump, Ashraful plays a cheeky shot towards third man, opening the face, using the pace of the ball
superb fielding from Chigumbura at deep backward square leg, a short and wide ball was slapped powerfully by Tamim, Chigumbura  raced across to cut that off, just about got to it in time
fullish ball outside off, Ashraful looks to muscle that through covers, misses
the ball drifts down the leg side, that's a wide
ovepritched on middle, defended watchfully by Ashraful
jumps away from the wicket to make room, the ball was heading for leg stump, so there was no space, he defends
again he blocks it back to the bowler
a bit of width, very full, Ashraful taps it back to the bowler
on the pads, turned to square leg
short and on the pads, clipped towards deep square leg, the fielder has a long chase from fine leg
length ball angling into leg, punched towards mid-on by Ashraful
overpitched on off stump, jammed back towards the bowler
very short from Chibhabha, the ball sits up to be hit, Ashraful pulls it in front of square for a boundary, easy runs that
back of a length on off, Ashraful bends his knees as he opens the face to guide the ball to third man
short and on leg stump, Tamim swings it straight towards short midwicket, should have done better with that poor delivery
back s away but Price follows him, dabbed towards cover
slightly overpitched from Price, Ashraful gets under that one and swings it over the long-on boundary, great timing on that shot
slightly shorter and on the pads, Ashraful comes down the track and launches it over midwicket for a four, last over of the Powerplay and Ashraful knows it
shortish and outside off, Ashraful flashes this one past point for another boundary, four more, Bangladesh galloping along
Ashraful taking Price apart here, another boundary, Ashraful backs away from the stumps, cracks it past backward point for four more
sweeps a leg stump delivery, the fielder at backward point drops it, that was a tough chance
steps down and punches it to long-off for a single to bring up the 100
nicely flighted, slightly overpitched outside off, Tamim taps it towards long-off, Ashraful pushes hard to come back for the second
length ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
and again, Tamim gets well forward and defends down the pitch
on the pads, a wristy shot from Tamim sends the ball towards midwicket
pitching on a length, on off, and turning away, Ashraful gets forward and punches it to short cover
on leg stump, turned to square leg
mishit by Ashraful, he was looking to clear extra cover, but the ball balloons towards the vacant mid-off area
patted back towards the bowler off the front foot
cautiously front foot defence from Tamim
overpitched outside off, Tamim drives firmly towards mid-off
very full, on middle, Ashraful taps it back towards the bowler
on the pads, Tamim nudges it on front of square leg for a single, bit of confused calling before the run is taken
full, on middle and leg, Ashraful drives it inside-out towards short cover, there was no run in that, but an overthrow gets them runs
turned towards midwicket for a single
gets forward and punches it towards long-off
Tamim stand tall and wristily works it away towards midwicket for a single
tossed up by Cremer, carved towards sweeper cover
Ashraful shapes for a big hit before blocking it back to the bowler
Ashraful opens the face of the bat to steer the ball towards cover
worked away with the spin towards midwicket for a single
Tamim jumps out of his crease, but Utseya slips in a shorter one, so Tamim pads it away
glanced to short fine leg, batsmen sprint through for a single
Ashraful gets his half-century by guiding a length ball through the covers
full on offstump, punched towards long-on by Tamim
played off the front foot towards point
full on middle and leg, Ashraful again drives inside-out towards long-off, 'Two, twop' was the call but he settles for one
blocked back down the pitch off the front foot
short and wide, easy boundary for Tamim, he slaps it past point
Tamim gets across and works it with soft hands towards midwicket, batsmen hurry through for a single
length ball, keeps a touch low, Tamim was backing away, has to adjust, he chops it towards sweeper cover
back of a length on off stump, Ashraful turns it to midwicket and immediately screams 'Nooo'
outside off, dabbed towards the covers
front foot defence, inside-edge towards square leg
Tamim stays on the back foot and drives it towards mid-off to get a single and reach his half-century
spinning down leg, Ashraful clips it towards midwicket
half-volley on leg stump, pushed back towards mid-on
back of a length, angling into the pads, whipped towards midwicket for a single
on the pads, glanced fine down the leg side for another easy boundary
length ball on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
length ball on off again, punched to mid-off, a quick single is taken, and there's an overthrow as well, sloppy from Zimbabwe
on the pads again, more easy runs for Bangladesh, guided to fine leg for two more runs, Bangladesh in cruise control here
length ball on off stump, Ashraful rocks back and flashes it in front of point for a boundary, Bangladesh looking to finish this in a hurry
tapped back towards the bowler
gets it wide of the bowler this time, down to long-off for a single
length ball on off stump, blocked back down the pitch
short and wide, a bottom edge sends the ball racing towards third man
fired into middle stump, solid front foot defence from Ashraful
back of a length on off stump, driven firmly to mid-off
poor delivery that, short and on legstump, helped along to a boundary, just behind square leg
pushed towards covers off the front foot
another short ball on leg stump, asking to be hit, Ashraful can only swing it to deep backward square leg for a single, 150 comes up
length ball just outside off, driven off the front foot towards mid-off
slower ball, could have been more runs for Bangladesh, but the straight drive breaks the stumps at the non-striker's end
Ashraful just about makes his ground as he comes back for two, punched towards long-off, and makes his ground courtesy a desperate dive
way down the leg side, Ashraful makes sure he gets out of its way
again down the leg side, this time Ashraful nudges it to square leg, disappointed that he couldn't score of that
leg stump again, brushes Ashraful's pads through to the keeper, called a wide though
this time Ashraful gets a couple, nudges it towards square leg
another wide down the leg side
wonderful shot from Ashraful, moves towards the leg side, takes a couple of paces down the track and slams it inside-out over extra cover
terrible ball, way down the leg side, missing leg stump by at least three feet
on offstump, blocked back towards the bowler
reaches across and turns it towards mid-on, fullish delivery
way outside off stump, and that's a free run for Bangladesh
much better, on a length, tight around the off stump, punched towards long-on for a single
full toss on middle and leg, turned towards midwicket, straight at the fielder
another poor delivery, high full toss outside off, Tamim crashes it past cover, Matsikenyeri makes a diving stop at the boundary

the Zimbabwe fans find their voice, they are screaming as Tamim holes out, Tamim was looking to loft it over long-on, mishits it and the ball swirls towards mid-on where Coventry takes a well-judged catch
back of a length on offstump, Ashraful opens the face to steer the ball towards point
it's a packed off side field, but Ashraful finds the gap anyway, it wasn't too bad a delivery, just a little bit of width, Ashraful flashes it past cover for a boundary, supreme timing on that
Raqibul gets forward and defends it towards the bowler
driven off the front foot towards mid-on to get off the mark
short ball, angling into off stump, Ashraful dabs it with soft hands towards cover
Raqibul shows the full face of the bat as he defends towards mid-on
fired down the leg side, that will be a wide
into the pads, Raqibul gets on the back foot and works the ball to square leg
again on the pads, nudged towards square leg for another single
short ball, on offstump, Ashraful wanted to pull that, was too early into the stroke, he is struck on the ribs
full toss on the pads, Zimbabwe are gifting away runs, Ashraful flicks that just behind square-leg for a six, just clears the rope, fantastic timing on that
back of a length just outside off, Ashraful backs away and glides the ball towards third man
way outside the off stump, he'll have to bowl that one again
driven firmly to mid-off, too firmly to have time to take a single
gets on the front foot, and punches the ball towards extra cover
length ball on offstump, Raqibul opens the face of the bat to guide the ball towards point
Ashraful sweeps from outside off, doesn't beat the square leg fielder
short ball on off, Ashraful charges down the pitch, only to punch the ball back to the bowler
again he uses his feet, this time he gets the single, swings the ball away towards mid-on
watchfully defended off the front foot by Raqibul
tapped towards mid-on for a single this time
Ashraful dances around in the crease, but isn't able to get any benefit out of it, he turns the ball to square leg, but can't beat the fielder there
Raqibul gets forward and turns it to midwicket
Ashraful gets a big stride in as he defends a leg stump delivery back towards the bowler
driven through the covers for a single
Raqibul stays on the backfoot and punches it to cover
way down the leg side, keeper can't collect either
Ashraful chops a short and wide ball past backward point for a boundary, Bangladesh closing in on a massive victory
a straight delivery, just outside off, Ashraful goes for the sweep, misses
opens the face to steer the ball behind point
goes for a roundhouse cut to a full delivery outside off, doesn't make contact
glided towards point for a single, Ashraful moves onto 95
Raqibul gets a big stride in as he blocks the ball back down the pitch
overpitched, punched down to long-on for an easy single
length ball, wide outside off, Ashraful bends his knees as he carves the ball past point for a single
Ashraful in total control here, he steps back from the stumps, lashes the ball through cover, there's protection in the deep though
well outside off, left alone by Raqibul
just a defensive push from Raqibul, sends the ball towards long-on
a googly from Cremer, Ashraful defends off the back foot
on middle and off, Ashraful gets behind the line and defends
driven inside-out towards sweeper cover for a single to retain the strike
well outside off, Ashraful chops it down to third man for a single, moves to 99
fullish on middle and off, Raqibul defends off the back foot
back of a length on offstump, more defence from Raqibul
length ball just outside off, driven firmly towards cover
short and outside off, punched off the back foot towards mid-off
more defence from Raqibul to end the over
chopped towards point, the wait for a century continues
gets behind the line and defends solidly
tries to force it past point, but a diving fielder there denies him
slower ball outside off, Ashraful goes for the cut but misses, the ball slides under his bat
that's his century, his 3rd on ODIs, an innovative shot from him to being up three figures, opened the face to glide the ball fine to the third man boundary
wanted to finish it off there, but a furious slash is fielded at cover
short and wide, Raqibul muscles it to mid-on
yorker on legstump, dug out by the batsman towards the off side
Zimbabwe are helping Bangladesh across the line here, that no-ball means only one more is needed, free-hit time
Raqibul finishes it with a lofted drive over mid-off for a boundary
